sitecontact_definition.customtext: Thank you for visiting. We appreciate your feedback. Please let us know how we can assist you.
sitecontact_definition.optiontext: Information request, General assistance, Website issue, Spam report, Complaint, Thank you!
sitecontact_definition.webconfirmtext: Your message has been sent. Thank you for contacting us.
sitecontact_definition.notetouser:
Dear %%username%%
This message confirms your email has been sent.
Thank you for your feedback.
Administrator %%sitename%% -------------------------------------------------------------
